findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: Functions will be aborted with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there will be a long addresses list or reward tokens list.

findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract owner has excessive privileges, including adding/removing admins, withdrawing ERC20 tokens, transferring syntheticToken ownership, changing start/end blocks, pausing/unpausing the contract, stopping stacking, minting/burning SyntheticERC20 tokens.
